description: Greaves blessed by Poseidon himself, earth-shaker and lord of seas. They grant dominion over water in all its formsâ€”still pools, raging rivers, and storm-tossed oceans. Champions of the sea god wear such greaves when they must assert his authority over the depths. The bronze is inscribed with prayers in ancient Greek.
magicEffect: Water breathing, Control water 1/day, Earthquake (water only) 1/day, +2 Constitution
name: Poseidon's Greaves
